entry.title: LED Surge Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 15.58

Protect your Pole Lights of 240W or higher by installing the surge protector in your fixture and increase the life of your pole light. One surge protector works in one pole light and is a single-phase surge protection device designed for outdoor lighting. The input voltage of the device is 120-277 volts and comes with a 5 years warranty. The design of the surge protector conforms to IEEE C62.41 2002C High. Reduce the failure rate of the LED driver in your light which gets burnt in the event of a voltage surge. This is where the surge protector will help the pole light.

Input Voltage: 120-277Vac
Frequency: 50-60Hz 
Maximum Continuous RMS Voltage AC: 320V 
Maximum Clamping Voltage (8/20us 100A): 845V 
Maximum Energy: 360J 
Maximum Peak Current: 10kA(8/20us standard wave) 
Life Warranty: 5 Years (Failed not by the surge

entry.title: Always ON Photo Control Shorting Cap
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 20.46

  • Supports LED lights with photocell sensors
  • Built from long-lasting material

Description

  • This accessory comes in handy if you do not wish to have dusk to dawn feature in pole lights or high bays function any further. The gasketed protective cap mounts on fixtures with locking-type receptacles when it is not desired to have lighting controlled by photo control.
  • It disables the functioning of photocell sensors and keeps the lights ON at all times unless turned OFF from a remote location. It further protects the fixture from water and dust.

Application

  • LED pole lights
  • LED flood lights
  • LED high bay lights

entry.title: 6FT Integrated connecting cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 10.22

  • Length: 6ft
  • Supports LED integrated tubes
  • Built from long-lasting material
  • cETL & RoHS* approved

*Certifications that set guidelines for SSL usage in Canada.

Description

  • Looking to connect LED Integrated Tubes in a row but wish for them to expand more, leaving space between the fixtures?
  • 6ft Integrated connecting cables by LEDMyPlace Canada come with a male connector on one side and female connector on the other.
  • Using this, you can easily connect LED integrated tubes- each at a distance of 6ft in a row, thus better covering a vast indoor space with uniform lighting.
  • Can connect up to 8 4ft integrated tubes and 3 8ft integrated tubes per power line.

Application

  • LED integrated tube lights

entry.title: 360° 3 Step Dimming Motion & Daylight Sensor for UFO High bay - 49ft max height
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 81.88

  • To be used with 0-10V dimmable LED drivers or ballasts for automatic dimming.
  • Built from long-lasting material
  • IP65-rated*
  • cUL & FCC** approved

*IP65 rated products are suitable for use in damp locations.

**Certifications that set guidelines for SSL usage in Canada

    Description

    • Are you worried about the high bay lights at your warehouse or garage remaining ON even when it is not required? You can now automate this process and instead focus on tasks that require your attention the most.
    • 360-degree 3-step dimming motion & daylight sensor for UFO LED high bay light helps automate the process so energy-consumption can be reduced and you can ultimately save more money on lighting bills.
    • It can detect motion within the range of 15m diameter when the mounting height is no more than 49ft. Once you walk into the said peripheral area, the lights basically light up and only dim gradually before completely turning OFF if there’s no motion detected.
    • The sensors easily detect moving objects within a 2,500 sq.ft. area. They also double-up as dusk-to-dawn sensors where they light up when it is dark and turn OFF otherwise.
    • You can sure save a lot of money having this sensor installed along with LED UFO high bay lights at work.

    Application

    • LED UFO high bay lights
entry.s:tag: Daylight Sensor for UFO High bay

entry.title: 3FT Integrated Connecting Cable Only For 30 Watt Integrated Tube
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 5.03

Features:

  • US BASED FACTORY DIRECT Pricing; NOTE : REMOVE THE BALLAST OR IT WILL BLOW OFF THE BULB , THESE BULBS DONT NEED BALLAST JUST DIRECT WIRE THESE. Only connect these 4 in a row. 
  • ETL,CE, ROHS Approved  .
  • FOR INTEGRATED TUBES 
  • Eligible for rebates with SOME of the elctric companies (we can help with paperwork also ) ,
  • SPECIAL CONTRACTOR & DISTRIBUTOR PRICING AVAILABLE ; 24/7 Phone Support ; US based Factory Direct Pricing ; 2 years no hassle warranty

Overview:

  • Easy Installation,
  • Applications: ,
  • Widely used in supermarkets, offices , convenience stores , gas stations , warehouse, shops , hotels , motels ,etc.
  • Benefits: ,
  • LED lighting uses significantly fewer Watts (W) than conventional lighting. But that's not the only Savings you enjoy when selecting LED lighting. ,
  • Conventional bulbs have a shorter operating lifetime compared to LED lighting. If you are using conventional bulbs you will be purchasing up to four times as many bulbs or fixtures compared to a single LED replacement with a long operating lifetime. ,
  • Buying and using conventional bulbs and fixtures also means that you incur three times more maintenance as well as replacement costs compared to LED lighting. ,
  • Just think of the maintenance costs incurred getting to those hard to reach locations. ,
  • LED lighting is also free of environmentally harmful Mercury as well as Halogen chemicals. ,

entry.title: Meanwell Driver HLG-150h48A
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 95.55

HLG-150H series is an LED driver of 150W AC/DC featuring constant voltage and constant current output. HLG-150H operates from 90～305VAC and provides versions with different rated voltage varying between 12V and 54V. The entire series will run for -40°C to +90°C case temperature under free air convection thanks to its high efficiency of up to 94 percent and fanless design. The metal housing architecture and IP67/IP65 intake safety level make this series suitable for indoor and outdoor use. HLG-150H has various feature choices, such as dimming methodologies, to give LED lighting systems the most design versatility.

entry.summary:

Type: LED Fixture Accessories
Price: 20.46

Description

  • It is always nice to have added layer of security outside the building in the form of lighting.
  • Having LED pole lights with Photocell Sensors helps lower energy consumption, helping you save your precious money every billing cycle.
  • This dusk to dawn feature detects the darkness and automatically lights up when the sun goes down or the weather turns dark.

Application

  • LED pole lights
